title: "Robo Notifier"
content: Robo Notifier is a website designed to help you stay on top of your important notifications and messages. Our simple graphic of a robot arm holding a smartphone serves as a reminder that technology can work for you, not against you. With our customizable wallpaper, you can easily place your most important notifications or messages in the designated space, ensuring that you never miss an important update. Whether it's work-related emails or personal messages from loved ones, Robo Notifier has got you covered. Stay organized and informed with our easy-to-use website.

prompts.title:
Write me short (max 3 words) title for website with main wallpaper that is:

"A wallpaper featuring a simple graphic of a robot arm holding a smartphone, with a space for placing important notifications or messages."

The title should not be 1:1 copy of the prompt but rather a short description of the website which is using this wallpaper.
prompts.content:
Write me some content for this website in markdown format.
The content should be a short description of the website which is using this wallpaper.

- You can include UTF-8 emojis
- You can use formatting like **bold** or _italic_
- Do not describe the wallpaper itself, but rather the website which is using it.
- Do not start with any title - title will be included automatically
- Do not include links
- Do not include images
